title: Lemon poppy seed biscuits with strawberry roses
ingredients: ['Biscuits', '225g unsalted butter, room temperature', '150g caster sugar', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '2 teaspoons lemon zest', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '300g plain flour', '2 tablespoons poppy seeds', '1 teaspoon sea salt', 'Filling', '225g cream cheese', '60g soured cream', '2 1/2 tablespoons caster sugar', 'Garnishes', '24 strawberries', '1 small bunch fresh mint']
